message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.DS, cs.DB. 

The paper presents a knowledge representation language that extends ASP with aggregates, which is a topic related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and logic programming (cs.PL). The paper also discusses the mathematical semantics of the language, which is related to logic (cs.LO). The algorithm for computing answer sets is related to data structures (cs.DS) and the comparison with other approaches is related to databases (cs.DB).
